sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Title as string,
		Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Title as string,
		Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2

sinks.name: NewAndUpdated
sinks.script:
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		Title,
		Cost
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['combofile.csv']) ~> NewAndUpdated

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn2, DerivedColumn1 exists(DerivedColumn2@myhash == DerivedColumn1@myhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
